body.name: Advanced Salicylic Acid & Sulphur Scrub Treatment Soap
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 49 mins
features: Super charged with powerhouse ingredients Sulphur and Salicylic Acid for healthy renewed skin
Brimming with exfoliating Almond and Walnut shell particles to thoroughly clean pores and help buff and beautify
Tighten Pores, calms inflammation and redness, unifies skin tone and leaves skin squeaky clean and rejuvenated
body.description: Many of us suffer from acne, blemishes or problem skin at some point in our lives. Salicylic Acid and Sulphur are two ultimate powerhouse ingredients in helping to achieve healthy beautiful skin and helping us look the best version of ourselves. The magic of the soap starts with the abundant exfoliating almond and walnut shell particles which deeply cleanse pores, and stimulate cell renewal. Salicylic Acid makes light work of unclogging pores, and removing dead cells revealing clearer, renewed complexion. And to ensure problem skin doesn't return the active ingredient, Sulphur, naturally goes to work in removing bacteria and absorbing excess oil. The treatment doesn't finish there, Vitamin E one of the best moisturising ingredients in the business, leaves the skin feeling incredibly soft, nourished and ready to face the world. This is a must have treatment for all those with problem skin. 80g | Made in England

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It helps a lot with textured skin and clogged pores I showed me good results in less then a weak it exfoliates nicely as well and it’s great to use with double cleansing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Addressed chronic folliculitis and textured skin. Awesome stuff!
reviews.reviewText: This bar is great! It has chemically exfoliated my skin in areas that have had chronic folliculitis and generally rough or bumpy skin my whole adult life. Mostly on my butt.- I leave it on my skin (body only, no face) for about 30 minutes every OTHER day. I spray my body with water and apply the soap. I think it would be less effective in the shower if used for only a couple of minutes a day, but experiment.- I’m a guy and my butt feels completely smooth and soft for the first time in my life. No raised bumps, acne or rough patches. The change is crazy!- The smell isn’t awful. The sulfur is masked with a light fragrant scent. Not too bad but maybe use another soap afterwards if you’re going to be around others and don’t want to carry this smell.- The bar itself can be a bit scratchy so I lather up my hands and apply the soap all over. It will exfoliate chemically so no real need to endure pain.- You’ll start noticing how it works after a couple uses and by week 2, your skin should feel very different than when you started.- Can be drying. I recommend lightly moisturizing afterwards.Will continue using!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product for too high price
reviews.reviewText: I loved this soap. But way too small for a bar soap and the price is high. It gives nice exfoliation. Smooth feeling after use. Way too small and I finished it very fast. Can be little drying and had to use more lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME AWESOME SOAP!
reviews.reviewText: The reviews were right- this is a gamer changer soap! Gentle and just so nice on my skin. This will be my permanent soap- it is wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really well and keeps me fresh all day
reviews.reviewText: I love how this has transformed my skin that is prone to acne and shaving bumps. It also feels like I sweat less during these humid 90 degree days, and I just feel fresher all around. I like the smell because it reminds me of hiking in the hills and bathing in springs, but you do smell a very slight sulfur smell that stays on your skin. It's calming and earthy to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Personally Made my skin worse, but you might be different
reviews.reviewText: I have often tried going back to these sulfur soaps but man they make me break out in cystic acne. It’s just not right for me. If you were a fan of the Proactive sulfur scrub or whatever that was this is similar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Originally bought to help remedy jock itch, which it did (thank goodness). But as I continued to use it I realized it was helping with my butt acne, KP, AND my strawberry skin on my legs. Not sure if it's intended for those uses but HOLY CROW. I've always had clear skin on my face but I have NEVER in my entire life (and I'm 33) had such clear and smooth skin on my arms and legs. And I have spent thousands of dollars over the years on SO many things (KP creams/cleansers, othery SA creams, cleansers & lotions, exfoliants, different loofahs and scrubbers, different razors etc) to try to remedy these issues. This simple bar of soap is an actual miracle product for $8. It is slightly drying so a basic moisturizer or oil -- I use an Olive Oil, Sweet Almond oil, Jojoba oil, Grape seed oil, Sunflower Oil & vitamin E blend from "Ancient Greek Remedy"-- will help keep you hydrated without causing issues. If you've got any or all of the following KP/strawberry legs/acne/jock itch... Give this a try. I will never be without it again in my home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Me agradó del producto que deja la cara suave, limpia y tersa.

reviews.reviewTitle: you can def smell the sulfur, but that is in the name and it works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using for only a week on and off and I can already see and feel the difference. I’ve been using it on my back annd legs and wow…my back and legs are soft, smooth and blemish free! I use it in conjunction with the cerave cream. Only downside is it turned my ring yellow so I’d advise not to wear jewellery while showing with this soap. But it definitely works!!!
Me gusta mucho como deja el cutis

Sehr gut geeignet für empfindliche Haut. Ich bekomme bei fast jedem neuen Produkt, das ich in meinem Gesucht ausprobiere eine allergische Reaktion (habe Neurodermitis) aber das war hier überhaupt nicht der Fall. Stinkt auch nicht so schlimm, wie ich es mir vorgestellt habe 😅 ich habe sie noch nicht lange, weswegen ich zur Wirkung nicht viel sagen kann. Trocknet die Haut ein wenig aus aber das ist wohl normal bei Schwefelseife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 13, 2023
